name: No Engine, No Problem
description:
In No Engine No Problem, you pilot a vehicle with no engine, but it's fine since you're joined together with two machine guns that help propel your through the level along with a grappling hook to get past obstacles and enemies.

At the end of each level, you must find a trailer, join it to the truck, and escort it to the drop-off zone to progress to the next level.

This game takes about 5-10 minutes to complete.

Made as an entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
